summary: Eloise Gwendolyn Sanford  was an American movie, television and stage actress.
full_text: Isabel Sanford  was an American stage, film and television actress best known for her role as Louise "Weezy" Mills-Jefferson on the CBS sitcoms All in the Family  and The Jeffersons . In 1981, she became the second black American actress to win a Primetime Emmy Award, and the first to win for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series.
title: Isabel Sanford
